name: trackthis-api-client
description: Default trackthis API client for javascript

scripts.build: cp readme.md docs/readme.md && cp src/factory.js lib/node.js && node_modules/.bin/browserify src/index.js -o lib/browser.js && node_modules/.bin/uglifyjs lib/browser.js -o lib/browser.min.js && cp lib/browser.js docs/assets/client.js
